title: Brushstroke Battle
description: Unleash your creativity in this ultimate art face-off! Express your imagination through colors and strokes, creating masterpieces that captivate and inspire. The most artistic vision wins!

guidelines.1: Paint an original artwork based on a given theme (revealed on the spot!).
guidelines.2: Bring your own painting materials (e.g., canvas, paints, brushes).
guidelines.3: Submit your artwork within the given time frame (e.g., 60 minutes).
guidelines.4: Follow these rules to avoid disqualification.

title: The Souls Symphony
description: A poetic battleground where words weave magic. Craft verses that touch hearts, stir emotions, and leave a lasting impact. Let your poetry speak for your soul and claim the spotlight!

guidelines.1: Write an original poem based on a given theme (revealed on the spot!).
guidelines.2: Bring your own writing materials (e.g., pen, paper).
guidelines.3: Plagiarism will not be tolerated. Ensure that your poem does not resemble any existing work.
guidelines.4: Submit your poem within the given time frame (e.g., 60 minutes).
guidelines.5: Follow these rules to avoid disqualification.

title: Cinemaster
description: A cinephileâ€™s dream quiz! Test your knowledge of movies, iconic scenes, and cinematic legends. From classics to blockbusters, only the ultimate movie buff will take the crown!

guidelines.1: Participate in a movie-based quiz with Multiple Choice Questions and other interactive rounds.
guidelines.2: Song/BGM Recognition: Identify songs or background music from various movies.
guidelines.3: Connections: Identify the link between movies, actors, directors, etc.
guidelines.4: Lyrics Identification: Complete or identify song lyrics from movies.
guidelines.5: No electronic devices (e.g., phones, tablets) allowed during the quiz.

title: Battle of Wits Arena
description: A debate where intellect meets persuasion. Argue your case, counter opponents with logic, and dominate the stage with your eloquence. The sharpest debaters will rise as champions!

guidelines.1: Participate in a debate on a given topic (revealed on the spot).
guidelines.2: Each speaker will have a limited time frame (e.g., 2-3 minutes) to present their views.
guidelines.3: Rebuttals and counterarguments are allowed within the given time frame.
guidelines.4: Maintain respectful decorum and refrain from personal attacks or insults on opposing team members' views.
guidelines.5: Engage in constructive and interesting discussions to earn extra points for your team!

title: Meme zone
description: The funniest battlefield where creativity meets humor! Craft hilarious, relatable, and trending memes that break the internet. The wittiest meme makers will rule the meme kingdom!

guidelines.1: Create and present original memes on a given theme (revealed on the spot).
guidelines.2: Each participant will have 20 minutes to create and present their memes.
guidelines.3: Judging will be based on creativity, humor, and relevance to the theme.
guidelines.4: No insulting or mocking other participants, judges, or staff.
guidelines.6: Follow these rules to avoid disqualification.
